GSP33brsvbh4u:1: nābhyarthyā iha santaḥ svayaṃ pravṛttā na cetare śakyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:3: śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅkamadhunā svarājyasaukhyaṃ vahannendraḥ sāndratapaḥsthiteṣu kathamapyudvegamabhyeṣyati
GSP33brsvbh4u:8: muktilakṣaṇasya phalasyātyantaparokṣatvāttadarthāni darśanaśravaṇamanananididhyāsanāni codyamānānyadṛṣṭārthānīti yāvadvidhānamanuṣṭheyāni na tu tato 'dhikamāvartanīyāni pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:9: yatra punaḥ sakṛdupadeśa upāsītetyādiṣu tatra sakṛdeva prayogaḥ prayājādivaditi prāpta ucyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:10: yadyapi muktiradṛṣṭacarī tathāpi savāsanāvidyocchedenātmanaḥ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇāyāstasyāḥ śrutisiddhatvādavidyāyāśca vidyotpādavirodhitayā vidyotpādena samucchedasyāhivibhramasyeva rajjutatvasākṣātkāreṇa samucchedasyopapattisiddhatvādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca śravaṇamanananididhyāsanābhyāsasyaiva svagocarasākṣātkāraphalatvena
GSP33brsvbh4u:15: na caitānyanāvṛttāni satkāradīrghakālanairantaryeṇa sākṣātkāravate tādṛśānubhavāya kalpante
GSP33brsvbh4u:17: na khalu pittopahṛtendriyasya guḍe tiktatāsākṣātkāro 'ntareṇamādhuryasākṣātkāraṃ sahasreṇāpyupapattibhirnivartitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh4u:18: atadvato narāntaravacāṃsivopapattisahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśato 'pi thūtkṛtya guḍatyāgāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:26: tathāca nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nitya eveti kṛtamatra pratyayāvṛtyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:30: virodhe vā tasya nityatvānnāvidyodīyeta kuta eva tu tena sahānuvarteta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:40: vākyaṃ cedyuktyapekṣaṃ sākṣātkārāya prabhavati tathā sati kṛtamāvṛtyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:43: na yuktivākye sākṣātkāraphale pratyakṣasyaiva pramāṇasya tatphalatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:44: te tu parokṣārthāvagāhinī sāmānyamātramabhiniviśate natu viśeṣaṃ sākṣātkuruta iti tadviśeṣasākṣātkārāyāvṛttirupāsyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:45: sā hi satkāradīrghakālanairantaryasevitā satī dṛḍhabhūmirviśeṣasākṣātkārāya prabhavati kāminībhāvaneva straiṇasya puṃsa iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:48: sa khalvayaṃ sākṣātkāraḥ śāstra yuktiyonirvā syādbhāvanāmātrayonirvā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:49: na tāvatparokṣābhāsavijñānaphale śāstrayuktī sākṣātkāralakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalaṃ prasotumarhataḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:54: kaścitkhalu śuddhasatvogarbhastha iva vāmadevaḥ śrutvā ca matvā ca kṣaṇamavadhāya jīvātmano brahmātmatamanubhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:56: ataścāvṛttiranarthikā yanniraṃśasya grahaṇamadgrahaṇaṃ vā na tu vyaktāvyaktatve sāmānyavaśeṣavatpadmarāgādivadityata āha--api cānekāṃśeti
GSP33brsvbh4u:58: ayamabhisandhiḥ---satyaṃ na brahmasākṣātkāraḥ sākṣādāgamayuktiphalamapi tu yuktyāgamārthajñānāhitasaṃskārasacivaṃ cittameva brahmaṇi sākṣātkāravartīṃ buddhivṛttiṃ samādhatte /
GSP33brsvbh4u:59: sā ca nānumānitavahnisākṣātkāravatprātibhatvenāpramāṇaṃ tadānīṃ vahnisvalakṣaṇasyaparokṣatvātsadātanaṃ tu brahmasvarūpasyopādhirūpitasya jīvasyāparokṣatvam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:61: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhādisvabhāvo brahmeti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:63: tasmādyathā gāndharvaśāstrārthajñānābhyāsāhitasaṃskāraḥ sacivena śrotreṇa ṣaḍjādisvaragrāmamūrcchanāmedamadhyakṣeṇekṣate evaṃ vedāntārthajñānāhitasaṃskāro jīvasya brahmasvabhāvamantaḥkaraṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:69: yatra parokṣapratibhāsini vākyārthe 'pi vyaktāvyaktatvatāratamyaṃ tatra mananottarakālamādhyāsanābhyāsanikarṣaprakarṣakramajanmani pratyayapravāhe sākṣātkārāvadhau vyaktitāratamyaṃ prati kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:70: tadevaṃ vākyamātrasyārthe 'pi na drāgityeva pratyaya ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:71: tattvamasīti tu vākyamatyantadurgrahapadārthaṃ na padārthajñānapūrvake svārthe jñāne drāgityeva pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:74: syādetat padārthasaṃsargātmā vākyārthaḥ padārthajñānakrameṇa tadadhīnanirūpaṇīyatayā kramavatpratītiryujyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:75: brahma tu niraṃśatvenāsasṛṣṭanānātvapadārthakamiti kasyānukramema kramavatī pratītiriti sakṛdeva tadgṛhyeta na vā gṛhyatetyuktamityata āha---yadyapi ca pratipattavya ātmā niraṃśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:79: tatkiṃmiyameva vākyajanitā pratītirātmani tathāca na sākṣātpratītirātmanyanāgataphalatvādasya ityata āha---tattu
GSP33brsvbh4u:81: etaduktaṃ bhavati---vākyārthaśravaṇamananottarakālā viśeṣaṇatrayavatī bhāvanā brahma sākṣātkārāya kalpata iti vākyārthapratītiḥ sākṣātkārasya pūrvarūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:84: duḥkhitvādipratyayaścātmani sarveṣāṃ sarvadotpadyata ityabādhitatvātsamīcīna iti balavānna śakyo 'panetumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:89: uktaṃ cāsya tatra tatropapatyā bādhanamevaṃ duḥkhitvādyabhimāno 'pi tathā
GSP33brsvbh4u:90: nahi nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasyātmanā upajanāpāyadharmāṇo duḥkhaśokādaya ātmāno bhavitumarhanti
GSP33brsvbh4u:91: nāpi dharmāḥ teṣāṃ tato 'tyantabhinnānāṃ taddharmatvānupapatteḥ, nahi gauraśvasya dharmaḥ saṃbandhasyāpi vyatirekāvyatirekābhyāṃ saṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāṃ ca vicārāsahatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:97: kasmādanubhavārtha evāvṛtyabhyupagamo yāvatā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavya ityādibhistatvamasivākyaviṣayādanyaviṣayaivāvṛttirvidhāsyata ityata āha---tatrāpi na tatvamasivākyārthāditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:98: ātmā vā are draṣṭavya ityādyātmaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:99: na ca tattvamasīvākyaviṣayādanyadātmadarśanamāmnātaṃ yenopakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:100: sadeva somyedamiti copakramya tattvamasītyupasaṃhṛta iti sa eva vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:104: nanu vidhipradhānatvādvākyasya na bhūtārthapradhānatvaṃ bhūtastvarthastadaṅgatayā pratyāyyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:105: yathāhuḥ 'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantam'ityādi śābaraṃ vākyaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ--'kāryamarthamavagamayantī codanā taccheṣatayā bhūtādikamavagamayati'ityāśaṅkyāha---niyuktasya cāsminnadhikṛto 'hamiti yathā tāvadbhūtārthaparyavasitā vedāntā na kāryavidhiniṣṭāstathopapāditaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt'
GSP33brsvbh4u:110: yadyapi tatvamasītyādyāḥ śrutayaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ pratipādayanti tathāpi tayorapahatapāpmatvānapahatapāpmatvādilakṣaṇaviruddhadharmasaṃsagreṇa nānatvasya viniścayācchruteśca tatvamasītyadyāyā 'mano brahma, 'ādityo
GSP33brsvbh4u:112: naca yathā samāropitaṃ sarpatvamanūdya rajjutvaṃ purovartino dravyasyavidhīyata evaṃ prakāśātmano jīvabhāvamanūdya paramātmatvaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:113: yuktaṃ hi purovartini dravye drāghīyasi sāmānyarūpeṇālocite viśeṣarūpeṇāgṛhīte viśeṣāntarasamāropaṇam
GSP33brsvbh4u:114: iha tu prakāśātmano nirviśeṣasāmānyasyāparādhīnaprakāśasya nāgṛhītamasti kiñcidrupamiti kasya viśeṣasyāgrahe kiṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ samāropyatām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:115: tasmādbrahmaṇo jīvabhāvāropāsaṃbhavājjīvo jīvo brahma ca hrahmeti tattvamasīti pratīkopadeśa eveti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:116: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate---śvetaketorātmaiva parameśvaraḥpratipattavyo na tu śvetaketorvyatiriktaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:117: bhede hi gauṇatvāpattirna ca mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:118: apica pratīkopadeśe sakṛdvacanaṃ tu pratīyate bhedadarśananindā ca(?) /
GSP33brsvbh4u:119: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati, nālpatvamatidavīya evopacaritatvam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:122: naca mānāntaravirodha ityādi tu sarvamupāditaṃ prathamādhyāye /
GSP33brsvbh4u:123: niraṃśasyāpi cānādyanirvācyāvidyātadvāsanāsamāropitavividhaprapañcātmanaḥ sāṃśasyeva kasyacidaṃśasyāgrahaṇādvibhrama iva paramārthastu na vibhramo nāma kaścinna ca saṃsāro nāma /
GSP33brsvbh4u:126: anye 'pyāhuḥ---'yadyadvaite na toṣo 'sti mukta evāsi sarvadā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:130: yathā hi śāstroktaṃ śuddhamuktasvabhāvaṃ brahmātmatvenaiva jīvenopāsyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:131: 'haṃ brahmāsmi tattvamasi śvetaketo ityādiṣu tkasya hetorjīvātmano
GSP33brsvbh4u:133: jīvātmānaścāvidyādarpaṇā yathā brahmapratibimbakāstathā yatra yatra mano brahmādityo brahmetyādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭerupadeśastatra sarvatrāhaṃ mana ityādi draṣṭavyaṃ brahmaṇo mukhyamātmatvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:136: tathāca tādṛśānāṃ pratīkopadeśānāṃ kvacit kasyacidvikārasya pravilayāvagamādbhedaprapañcapravilayaparatvameveti prāpta ucyate---na
GSP33brsvbh4u:137: tāvadahaṃ brahmetyādibhiryathāhaṅkārāspadasya brahmātmatvamupadiśyate evaṃ mano brahmetyādibhirahaṅkārāspadatvaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ, kintveṣāṃ brahmatvenopāsyatvam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:142: tasmādyasya yanmātrātmatayopāsanaṃ vihitaṃ tasya tanmātrātmatayaiva pratipattavyaṃ 'yāvadvacanaṃ vācanikam 'iti nyāyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:144: naca sarvasya vākyajātasya prapañcasya vilayaḥ prayojanam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:145: tadarthatve hi mana iti pratīkagrahaṇamanarthakaṃ viśvamiti vācyaṃ yathā sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:150: anubhavādvā pratīkānāṃ manaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmatvenākalanaṃ śrutervā, na tvetadubhayamastītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:152: nanu yathāvacchinnasyāhaṅkarāspadasyānavacchinnabrahmātmatayā bhavatyabhāva evaṃ pratīkānāmapi bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svarūpopamarde ca nāmādīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:157: etadato bhavati---pradhānībhūtānāṃ na pratīkānāmucchedo yukto naca taducchede vidheyasyāpyupapattiriti
GSP33brsvbh4u:159: nahyupāsanavidhānāni jīvātmano brahmasvabhāvapratipādanaparaistatvamasyādisaṃdarbhairekavākyabhāvamāpadyante yena tadekavākyatayā brahmadṛṣṭyupadeśeṣvātmadṛṣṭiḥ kalpeta bhinnaprakaraṇatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:160: tathāca tatra yathālokapratītivyavasthito jīvaḥ kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī na brahmeti kathaṃ tasya brahmātmatayābrahmadṛṣṭyupadeśeṣvātmadṛṣṭirupadiśyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:162: yadyapyupāsako jīvātmā na brahmavikāraḥ, pratīkāni tu manaḥprabhṛtīnibrahmavikārastathāpyavacchinnatayā jīvātmanaḥ pratīkaiḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:166: yadyapi sāmānādhikaraṇmubhayathāpi ghaṭate tathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣatayā phalaprasavasāmarthyena phalavatvātprādhānyena tadevādityādidṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃskartavyamityādityādidṛṣṭayo brahmaṇyeva kartavyā na tu brahmadṛṣṭirādityādiṣu /
GSP33brsvbh4u:167: na caivaṃvidhe 'vadhṛte śāstrārthe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭinorkṛṣṭa iti laukiko nyāyo 'pavādāya prabhavatyāgamavirodhena tasyaivāpoditatvāditi pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:168: satyaṃ sarvādhyakṣatayā phaladātṛtvena brahmaṇa eva sarvatra vāstavaṃ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi śabdagatyanurodhena kvacitkarmaṇa eva prādhānyamavasīyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:171: atra hi sarvatra yāgādyārādhitā devataiva phalaṃ prayacchatīti sthāpitaṃ tathāpi śabdataḥ karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvāvagamane phalavatvapratīteḥ prādhānyam
GSP33brsvbh4u:174: tadiha yadyapi sarvādhyakṣatayā vastuto brahmaiva phalaṃ prayacchati tathāpi śāstraṃ brahmabuddhyā'dityādau pratīka upāsyamāne brahma phalāya kalpate ityabhivadati kiṃvādityādibuddhyā brahmaiva viṣayīkṛtaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:175: phalāyetyubhayathāpi brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhyakṣasya phaladānopapatteḥ śāstrārthasaṃdehe lokānusārato niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:177: na kevalaṃ laukiko nyāyo niścaye heturapi tu ādityādiśabdānāṃ prāthamyena
GSP33brsvbh4u:180: tathāhi----svarapravṛtyā ādityādiśabdā yathā svārthe vartante tathā brahmaśabdo 'pi svārthe vartsyati yadi svārtho 'sya vipakṣitaḥsyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:181: tathācetiparatvamanarthakaṃ tasmāditīnā svārthātpracyāvya brahmapadaṃ jñānaparaṃ svarūpaparaṃ vā kartavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:182: naca brahmapadamādityādipadārtha iti, pratītipara evāyamitiparaḥśabdo yathā gauriti me gavayo 'bhavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:183: tathāca ādityādayo brahmeti pratipattavyā ityartho bhavatītyāha---itiparatvādapi brahmaśabdasyeti
GSP33brsvbh4u:188: satsvapi ādityādiṣu phalānutpādādutpattimataḥ karmaṇa eva phaladarśanātkarmaiva phalavat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:191: ādityādiṣu punarudgīthādidṛṣṭāvudgīthādibudyopāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakaḥsantaḥ phalāya kalpiṣyanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:192: ata eva ca pṛthvyagnyorṛksāmaśabdaprayoga upapanno yataḥ pṛthvyāmṛgdṛṣṭiradhyastāgnau ca sāmadṛṣṭiḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:193: sāmni punaragnidṛṣṭau ṛci ca pṛthvīdṛṣṭau viparītaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:196: evaṃ khalvadhikaraṇanirdeśo viṣayatvapratipādanapara upapadyate yadi lokeṣu sāmadṛṣṭiradhyasyeta nānyatheti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:200: nahyādityādibhiḥ kiñcitkriyate yadvidyayā vīryavattaraṃ bhavedādityādimatyā vidyayodgīthādikarmasu kāryeṣu yadeva vidyaya karoti tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatītyādityamatīnāmupapadyate udgīthādiṣu saṃskārakatvenopayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:202: yatra hi karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tatraivaṃ bhavatu yatra tu guṇātaphalaṃ tatra guṇasya siddhatvenākāryatvātkarotītyeva nāstītyatra vidyāyāḥ kva upayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:204: na tāvadguṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvaḥ kāryāya phalāya paryāptaḥ, mā bhūtprakṛtakarmāniveśino yatkiñcitphalotpādaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:205: tasmātprakṛtāpūrvasaṃniveśinaḥ phalotpāda iti tasya kriyamāṇatvena vidyayā vīryavattaratvopapattiriti
GSP33brsvbh4u:210: nanūktaṃ siddharūpairādityādibhiradhyastaiḥ sādhyabhūtatvamabhibhūtaṅkarmaṇāmityata āha---ādityādibhāvenāpi ca dṛśyamānānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:212: api tu māṇavaka ivāgnidṛṣṭiḥ kenacittīvratvādinā guṇena gauṇyanabhibhūtamāṇavakatvāttathehāpi
GSP33brsvbh4u:221: tatra yadi sāmadhīradhyasyeta tato na sāmānyupāsyeran api tu lokāḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:222: tathā ca dvitīyārthaṃ parityajya tṛtīyārthaḥ parikalpayeta sāmneti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:224: akāre gāvo vāsyantāṃ prāvāre kusumānītivat tenoktanyāyānurodhena saptamyāścobhayathāpyavaśyaṃ kalpanīyārthatvādvaraṃ yathāśrutadvitīyārthānurodhāya tṛtīyārthe saptamī vyākhyātavyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:227: tatrāpi samastasya saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanamiti sāmna upāsyatvaśruteḥ sādhviti pañcavidhasya
GSP33brsvbh4u:230: hiṅkārānuvādena pṛthivīdṛṣṭividhāne hiṅkāraḥ pṛthivīti prāpte viparītanirdeśaḥ pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:233: karmāṅgasaṃmandhiṣu yatra hi tiṣṭhataḥ karma coditaṃ tatra tatsaṃbaddhopāsānāpi tiṣṭhataiva kartavyā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:236: pramāṇatantrā ca vastuvyavasthā pramāṇaṃ ca .....nāpekṣata iti
GSP33brsvbh4u:238: yanmahatā prayatnena vinopāsitumaśakyaṃ yathā pratīkādi, yathā vā samyagdarśanamapi tatvamasyādi, tatraiṣā cintā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:239: tatra codakaśāstrābhāvādaniyame prāpte yathā śakyata ityupabhandhādāsīnasyaiva siddham /
GSP33brsvbh4u:240: nanu yasyāmavasthāyāṃ dhyāyatirupacaryate prayujyate kimasau tadā tiṣṭhato na bhavati na bhavatītyāha
GSP33brsvbh4u:249: same śucau śarkarāvahnivālukāvivarjita ityādivacanānniyame siddhe digdeśādiniyamamavācanikamapi prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajetetivadvaidikārambhasāmānyātkvacitkaścitadāśaṅkate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:258: śāstraṃ hi niyojyasya kāryarūpaniyogasaṃbandhamavabodhayati tasyaiva karmaṇyaiśvaryalakṣaṇamadhikāraṃ taccaitadubhayamatīndriyatvādbhavati śāstralakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇāntarāprāpye śāstrasyārthavattvādbrahmātvapratītestu
GSP33brsvbh4u:259: jīvanmuktena dṛṣṭatvānnāstīha tirohitamiva kiñcaneti kimatra śāstraṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:260: nanvevamapyabhyudayaphalānyupāsanāni tatra niyojyaniyogalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇi svāmitālakṣaṇasya ca saṃbandhasyātīndriyatvāttatra sakṛtkāraṇādeva śāstrārthasamāptauprāptāyāmupāsanapadavedanīyāvṛttimātrameva kṛtavata uparamaḥ prāptastāvataiva kṛtaśāstrārthatvāditi prāpte
GSP33brsvbh4u:261: 'bhidhīyate--savijñāno bhavatītyādiśruteryatra svargādiphalānāmapi karmaṇāṃ prāyaṇakāle svargādivijñānāpekṣakatvaṃ tatra kaiva kathātīndriyaphalānāmupāsanānām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:262: tāni khalu āprāyaṇaṃ tattadupāsyagocarabuddhipravāhavāhitayā dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa prāyaṇasamaye tadbuddiṃ bhāvayiṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:263: kimatra phalavatprāyaṇasamaye buddhyākṣepeṇa nahi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:266: tathā ca śrutiḥ sarvādīndriyaviṣaya--'sa yathākraturasmāllokāt praiti tātkraturhāmuṃ lokaṃ pretyabhisaṃbhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:273: tatra tāvatprathamamidaṃ vicāryate kiṃ brahmādhigame brahmajñāne sati brahmajñānaphalānmokṣādviparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ bandhanaphalaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyata iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:274: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, śāstreṇa hi phalāya yadvihitaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ cānarthaparihārāyāśvamedhādi brahmahatyādi cāpūrvāntaravyāpāraṃ kiṃ tadapūrvamuparate 'pi karmaṇyatra sukhaduḥkhopabhogātprāṅgāvirantumarhati sa hi tasya vināśahetustadabhāve kathaṃ vinaśyediti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:276: adattaphalaṃ cetkarmāpūrvaṃ vinaśyati karmaṇa eva phalaprasavasāmarthyabodhakaśāstramapramāṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:277: naca prāyaścittamiva brahmajñānamadattaphalānyapi karmapūrvāṇi kṣiṇotīti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:280: ata eva smaranti nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:281: yadi punarapekṣitopāyatātmā prāyaścittavidhirna niyojyaviśeṣapratilambhamātreṇa nirvṛṇotītyapekṣitākāṅkṣāyāṃ doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇāttannibarhaṇaphalaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:284: śāstraprāmāṇyātsaṃbhaviṣyatyasāvavasthā yasyāmupabhogena samastakarmakṣaye brahmajñānaṃ mokṣaṃ prasoṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:285: yogādhdyairva vā divi bhuvyantarīkṣe bahūni śarīrendriyāṇi nirmāya phalānyupabhujyarddhena yogasāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:286: sthite caitasminnarthe nyāyabalādyathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādivyapadeśo brahmavidyāstutimātraparatayā vyākhyeya iti prāpta ucyate--vyākhyāyetaivaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:288: śāstraṃ hi phalotpādanasāmarthyamātraṃ karmaṇāmavagamayati na tu kutaścidāgantukānnimittataḥ prāyaścittādestadapratibandhamapi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:290: yadi śāstrabodhitaphalaprasavasāmarthyamapratibaddhamāgantukena kenacit karmaṇā tatastatphalaṃ prasūta eveti na śāstravyāghātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:293: yatrāpi nirguṇāyāṃ paravidyāyāṃ doṣoddheśo nāsti tatrāpi tatsvabhāvālocanādeva tatprakṣayaprasavasāmarthyamavasīyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:294: nahi tattvamasivākyārthaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilakartṛbhoktṛtvādivibhramo jīvaḥ phalopabhogona yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:295: nahi rajjavāṃ bhujaṅkasamāropanibandhanā bhayakampādayaḥ sati rajjutatvasākṣātkāre prabhavanti, kintu saṃskāraśeṣātkiñcitkālamanuvṛttā api nivartanta eva /
GSP33brsvbh4u:296: amumevārthamanuvadanto yathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādayo vyapadeśāḥ samavetārthāḥ santo na stutimātratayā kathañcidvyākhyānamarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:297: nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā yogarddheḥ prabhāvato yugapannaikavidhakāyanirmāṇenāparyāyeṇopabhogādvā jantuḥ karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyata ityata āha---evameva ca mokṣa upapadyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:298: anādikālapravṛttā hi karmāśayā aniyatakālavipākāḥ kramavatā tāvadbhogena kṣetumaśakyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:304: nanu satsvapi karmāśayāntareṣu sukhaduḥkhaphaleṣu mokṣaphalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarato brahmabhāvamanubhūyātha labdhavipākānāṃ karmāntarāṇāṃ phalāni bhokṣyanta ityāha--naca deśakālanimittāpekṣā iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:305: nahi kāryaḥ sanmokṣo mokṣo bhavitumarhati brahmabhāvo hi saḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:309: jñānasya cānantarabhāvinījñeyābhivyaktiḥ phalaṃ, saivāvidyocchedamādadhatī brahmasvabhāvasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇāya mokṣāya kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:311: apūrvādhānaparamparayā jñānasya mokṣaphale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣaphalatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:316: adharmasya svābhāvikatvena rāgādinibandhanatvena śāstrīyeṇa brahmajñānena pratibandho yuktaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:321: yathā devadatto dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte na vāmena paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:322: ubhe hyevaiṣa ete taratīti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ, brahmajñānena duṣkṛtaṃ bhogena sukṛtamiti
GSP33brsvbh4u:325: tasmādbrahmajñānādduṣkṛtasyaiva kṣayo na sukṛtasyeti prāpte pūrvādhikaraṇarāddhānte 'tidiśyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:326: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacidadṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtamapanayatyapi tu dṛṣṭenaiva bhoktṛbhoktavyabhogādipravilayadvāreṇa taccaitattulyaṃ sukṛtepīti kathametadapi nocchindyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:327: evaṃ ca sati na śāstrīyatvasāmyamātramavirodhaheturnahi pratyakṣatvasāmānyamātrādavirodho jalānalādīnāṃ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:333: tadyathā puṇyapāpe anukramya sarve pāpmāno 'to nivartanta ityatra /
GSP33brsvbh4u:342: māyāvādinaśca puṇyapāpayoścamāyāmātravinirmitatvena māyānivṛttau na puṇyāpuṇye na tatsaṃskāro vastusantīti kasyānuvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:343: naca rajjau sarpādivibhramajanitā bhayakampādayo nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:346: atra tu na māyā na tajjaḥ saṃskāro na tadgocara iti tucchatvātkimanuvarteta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:348: naca tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsya iti śruterdehapātapratīkṣārabdhakāryāṇāṃ yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:350: yathā loka etāvanme ciraṃ yatsnāto bhuñjānaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:351: nahi tatra snānabhojane avadhitvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyastā pratipādyate ubhayavidhāne hi vākyaṃ bhidyetāvadhibhedaḥ ciratāceti prāpte
GSP33brsvbh4u:355: tathāpyanārabdhavipākaṃ karmajātaṃ drāgityeva samucchinatti na tvārabdhavipākaṃ saṃpāditajātyāyurvitatapūrvāparībhūtasukhaduḥkhopabhogapravāhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:357: anyathā devarṣīṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamanūddālakaprabhṛtīnāṃvigalitanikhilakleśajālāvaraṇatayā paritaḥ pradyotamānabuddhisatvānāṃ na jyogjīvitā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:358: śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tattvajñatā ca mahākalpakalpamanvantarādijīvitā ca
GSP33brsvbh4u:359: na caite mahādhiyo na brahmavido brahmacidaścālpapuṇyamedhaso manuṣyā iti śraddheyaṃ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:363: api tu śrutyantarasiddhāṃ ciratāmanūdya dehapātāvadhimātravidhānaṃ tadetadabhisaṃdhāyaucityamātratayāha sma bhagavān bhāṣyākāraḥ---na
GSP33brsvbh4u:365: na cedaṃ na jātu dṛṣṭaṃ yadvirodhisamavāye viroddhyantaramanuvartata
GSP33brsvbh4u:370: tadevaṃ madhyasthānpratipādya ye bhāṣyakāramāptaṃ manyante tān
GSP33brsvbh4u:377: sa cāsanna nirvacanīya iti kuto vastusataḥ karyotpādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:384: yadi puṇyasyāpyaśleṣavināśau hanta nityamapyagnihotrādi na kartavyaṃ yogamārūrukṣuṇā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:387: naca vividiṣanti yajñena dāneti mokṣalakṣaṇaikakāryatayā vidyākarmaṇoravirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:389: nahyetamātmānaṃ viduṣo vigalitākhilakartṛbhoktṛtvādiprapañcavibhramasya pūrvottare nitye kriyājanye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:390: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñeneti vartamānāpadeśo brahmajñānasya yajñādīnāṃ vā stutimātraṃ na tu mokṣamāṇasya muktisādhanaṃ yajñādividhiriti prāpta ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:393: naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:397: evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā kathañcidvyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:398: tadanenābhisamadhinoktaṃ--jñānasyeva hi prāpakaṃ satkarma praṇaḍyā mokṣakāraṇamityupacaryate
GSP33brsvbh4u:399: yata eva na vidyodayasamaye karmāsti nāpi parastādapi tu prāgeva vidyāyāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh4u:406: kāmyakarmaviṣayamaśleṣavināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā dāyamupayantīti //17//
GSP33brsvbh4u:409: asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:411: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyānna brāhmaṇabruvāya mūrkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya hetostasyātiśayavatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:413: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñenetyaviśeṣaśrutamapi vidyāsahite yajñādāvupasaṃhartavyamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadeva vidyayā karoti tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya
GSP33brsvbh4u:416: tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18//
GSP33brsvbh4u:419: anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena sūtreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh4u:420: asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt
GSP33brsvbh4u:421: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh4u:428: aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:429: nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva
GSP33brsvbh4u:444: tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viśiṃṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:451: āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /
GSP33brsvbh4u:452: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:459: yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu
GSP33brsvbh4u:460: vṛttilayaḥ, ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:461: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh4u:464: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:465: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:467: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām
GSP33brsvbh4u:469: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--satyam, āpo 'nnamasṛjanta iti śruterabannayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo 'vagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:471: svayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
GSP33brsvbh4u:472: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:473: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3//
GSP33brsvbh4u:476: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:496: yadyapi prāṇastejasītyatastejasi prāṇavṛttilayaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo
GSP33brsvbh4u:498: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:503: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:506: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyakṣasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastejasīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:530: karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare
GSP33brsvbh4u:535: atrāmṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:542: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:543: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:550: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:551: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati--neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:553: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:558: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:560: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti
GSP33brsvbh4u:563: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratattvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:564: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:567: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti
GSP33brsvbh4u:576: athetarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasyāśrayabhūtamutkramaddehāddehāntaraṃ vā saṃcaratkasmādasmābhirna nirīkṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:578: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram--
GSP33brsvbh4u:582: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:583: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat
GSP33brsvbh4u:584: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti
GSP33brsvbh4u:586: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:590: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:608: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhacchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:610: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥśreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:611: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:612: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ, smṛtiśca mumukṣoḥ śukasyādityamaṇḍalaprasthānaṃ darśayatīti prāptam //12//
GSP33brsvbh4u:618: tathā hi--ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano
GSP33brsvbh4u:619: 'nutkrāntiṃ parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ pratijñāya tatsiddhyarthamutkrāntyavadherucchvayanādhmāne bruvanyasyocchvayanādhmāne
GSP33brsvbh4u:621: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:624: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha--
GSP33brsvbh4u:626: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:629: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
GSP33brsvbh4u:630: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:635: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:646: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
GSP33brsvbh4u:655: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:660: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh4u:663: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā |
GSP33brsvbh4u:665: tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva, apare tu sthānāntarebhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:667: tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyoccikramiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati nānyebhyaścakṣurādisthānebhyaḥ kutaḥ--vidyāsāmarthāt hārdavidyāsāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:672: hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:673: tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā nāḍyā niṣkrāmati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:674: hṛdayādudgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālumūlaṃ bhittvā mūrdhānametya raśmibhirekībhūtā ādityamaṇḍalamanupraviṣṭā tāmanuśīlayatastayaivāntakāle nirgamanaṃ bhavatīti //17//
GSP33brsvbh4u:677: rātrāvahani cāviśeṣeṇa raśmyanusārī sannādityamaṇḍalaṃ prāpnotīti siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18//
GSP33brsvbh4u:685: amuṣmādādityātpratāyante raśmayasta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante avistāryante te raśmayo 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:688: candramasā khalvammayena saṃbadhyamānānāṃ sūrīṇāṃ bhāsāṃ candrikātvam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:690: ye tyāhuḥ--sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchediti nirapekṣaśravaṇādrātrau prete nāsti raśmyapekṣeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:694: ye tu manyante vidvānapi rātriprāyaṇāparādhena nordhvamākramata iti
GSP33brsvbh4u:697: nityavatphalasaṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yukteti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:698: ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣo 'harapekṣāṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprāptirācakṣate
GSP33brsvbh4u:714: āpūryamāṇapakṣādityādyā ca śrutirna kālaviśeṣapratipattyarthā, api tvātivāhikīrdevatāḥ pratipādayatīti vakṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:719: kāla evātra prādhānyenocyate na tvātivāhikī devatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:720: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite |
GSP33brsvbh4u:721: smārtīmupāsanāṃ pratyayaṃ smārtaḥ kālabhedaviniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīṃ pratītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:722: atra yadi smṛtau kālabhedavidhiḥ śrutau cāgnijyotirādividhistatrāgnyādīnāmātivāhikatayā viṣayavyavasthayā virodhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:723: atha tu pratyabhijñānaṃ tathāpi yatra kāla ityatrāpi kālābhidhānadvāreṇātivāhikya eva devatā uktā ityavirodha eveti //21//
GSP33brsvbh4u:724: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 // //
GSP33brsvbh4u:730: gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā gatistvarāvatī kalpyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:732: atha taireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate pathyantarasya nivartanīyasyābhāvāttasmātparānapekṣā evaite panthāna ekabrahmalokaprāptyupāyā vrīhiyavāviva vikalperanniti prāpte
GSP33brsvbh4u:735: saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:740: athaitaireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ na tāvadarthāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ tatprāpakaireva vākyāntarairvirodhāt, tasmādanyānapekṣāmasyāvadhārayatīti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:741: na caikaṃ vākyamaprāptamadhvānaṃ prāpayati tasya cānapekṣatāṃ pratipādayatītyarthadvayāya
GSP33brsvbh4u:744: na khalvekasminneva gantavye pathibhedamapekṣya tvarāvakalpyate kintu gantavyabhedādapi tadupapattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:745: yathā kaśmīrebhyo mathurāṃ kṣipraṃ yāti caitra iti tathehāpyanyataḥ kutaścidgantavyādanenopāyena brahmalokaṃ kṣipraṃ prayātīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:750: tasmādbhūyasāṃ parvaṇāmavirodhenālpānāṃ tadanupraveśa eva yukta iti //1//
GSP33brsvbh4u:755: ' 'sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvamākramate'iti hi vāyunimittamūrdhvākramaṇaṃ śrutaṃ na tu vāyunimittamādityagamanaṃ 'sa ādityaṃ
GSP33brsvbh4u:759: tatrāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokamityādisaṃdarbhagatasya pāṭhasya kvacinniyāmakatvena kḷptasāmarthyādagnivāyuvaruṇakramaniyāmakaśrutyādyabhāvāditi prāpte pratyucyate-ūrdhvaśabdo na lokasya kasyacitpratipādakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:761: bhavedetadevaṃ yadyūrdhvaśabdātkaścillokabhedaḥ pratīyeta sa tūparideśamātravācī lokabhedādvināparyavasyaṃllokabhedavācinādityapadenāditye vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:762: tathā cādityalokagamanameva vāyunimittamiti śrautakramaniyame, pāṭhaḥ padārthamātrapradarśanārtho na tu kramāya prabhavati śrutivirodhāditi siddham /
GSP33brsvbh4u:763: vājasaneyināṃ saṃvatsaraloko na paṭhyate chāndogyānāṃ devaloko na paṭhyate tatrobhayānurodhādubhayapāṭhe māsasaṃbandhātsaṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devalokaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:764: nahi māso devalokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa /
GSP33brsvbh4u:765: tasmāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhānmāsārabhyatvācca saṃvatsarasya māsānantarye sthite devalokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastādbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:766: tatrādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsarādityasya sthāne devalokādvāyumiti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:781: na caiṣāṃ tvāvadhikānāmiva niyamavatī saṃvahanasvarūpā svatanantrakriyā buddhipūrvā saṃbhavatyacetanānām
GSP33brsvbh4u:784: na heturnāguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacit //
GSP33brsvbh4u:785: jāḍyādbaddha ityādiṣu guṇavacaneṣu jāḍyādiṣu hetupañcamī dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:786: na cārcirādiśabdā guṇavācino yena pañcamyā teṣāṃ vahanaṃ prati hetutvamucyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:788: na cāmānavasya puruṣasya vidyudādiṣu voḍhṛtvadarśanādarcirādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvamunneyam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:789: yāvadvacanaṃ hi vācanikaṃ na tadavācye saṃcārayitumucitam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:790: api cārcirādīnāṃ voḍhṛtve vidyudādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvānnāmānavaḥ puruṣo voḍhā śrūyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:792: tasmādbhogabhūmaya evārcirādayo nātivāhikā iti prāpte pratyucyate-saṃpiṇḍakaraṇānāṃ hi sūkṣmadehavatāṃ gatau /
GSP33brsvbh4u:793: na svātantryaṃ na cāgnyādyā netāro 'cetanāstu te //
GSP33brsvbh4u:794: īdṛśī hi niyamavatī gatiḥ svayaṃ vā prekṣāvato 'prekṣāvato vā prekṣāvatprayuktasya /
GSP33brsvbh4u:795: na tāvadvigalitasthūlakalevarāḥ sūkṣmadehavantaḥ saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇagrāmā utkrāntimanto jīvātmāno mattamūrcchicavatsvayaṃ prekṣāvanto yadevaṃ svātantryeṇa gaccheyustadyadyarcirādayo 'pi mārgacihnāni vā śamīkāraskarādivadbhogabhūmayo vā sumeruśailelāvṛttādivadubhayathāpyacetanatayā na nayanaṃ pratyeṣāmasti svātantryam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:796: na caitebhyo 'nyasya cetanasya netuḥ kalpanā sati śrutānāṃ caitanyasaṃbhave /
GSP33brsvbh4u:799: tasmādvyavasthita eva parameśvarasya sarvādhyakṣatve yathā yathātvaṃ lokapālādīnāṃ svātantryamevamihāpyarcirādīnāmātivāhikatvameva darśanānusārācchabdārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:803: arciṣa iti ca hetau pañcamī nāpādāne /
GSP33brsvbh4u:809: yathā brāhmaṇamānaya bhojayitavya iti tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yadā tatsaṃnidhāvupanipatati padaṃ kaṇṭhādi(?) tadā tenaitanniyamyate evamihāpīti //4 //
GSP33brsvbh4u:814: vidyullokamāgato 'mānavaḥ puruṣo vaidyutastenaiva na tu varuṇādinā svayamuhyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:816: varuṇādayastu tatsāhāyake vartamānā voḍhāro bhavantīti ca vaiṣamyaṃ na voḍhṛtve iti sarvamavadātam
GSP33brsvbh4u:820: kiṃ paraṃ brahma gamayatyāhosvidaparaṃ kāryaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:823: brahma gamayatītyatra hi napuṃsakaṃ brahmapadaṃ parasminneva brahmaṇi nirūḍhatvādanapekṣatayā mukhyamiti sati saṃbhave na kārye brahmaṇi guṇakalpanayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:826: kiñca tatra tatra parameva brahma prakṛtya prajāpatisadmapratipattyādaya ucyamānā nāparabrahmaviṣayā bhavitumarhanti prakaraṇavirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:827: na ca parasmintsarvagate gatirnopapadyate prāptatvāditi yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:829: yathaikasminnyagrodhapādape mūlādagramagrācca mūlaṃ gacchataḥ śākhāmṛgasyaikenaiva nyagrodhapādapena nirantaraṃ saṃyogavibhāgā bhavanti
GSP33brsvbh4u:830: na caite tadavayavaviṣayī na tu nyagrodhaviṣayā iti sāmprataṃ tathā sati na śākhāmṛgo nyagrodhena yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:832: evaṃ dṛśyamānānāmapi tadavayavānāṃ na yogastadavayavayogāttadantena krameṇa tadavayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:833: te cātīndriyā iti kasminnu nāmāyamanubhavapaddhatimadhyāstāṃ saṃyogatapasvī /
GSP33brsvbh4u:837: lokaśabdaścālokane prakāśe vartayitavyo na tu sanniveśavati deśaviśeṣe /
GSP33brsvbh4u:839: yathā vidyākarmavaśādarcirādinā gatasya satyalokamatikramya paraṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma lokamālokaṃ svayaṃ prakāśakamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:840: prāptasya tatraiva liṅgaṃ pralīyate na tu gatimevaṃbhūtāṃ vinā liṅgapravilaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:841: ata eva śrutiḥ- puruṣamāṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:842: tadanenābhisandhinā paraṃ brahma gamayatyamānava iti mene jaiminirācāryaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:849: advaitabrahmatattvasākṣātkāravatastu vigalitanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsavibhramasya na gantavyaṃ na gatirna gamayitāra iti kiṃ kena saṃgatam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:851: naca tatrāpi prāptaprāptiḥ karmajena hi vibhāgena niruddhāyāṃ pūrvaprāptāvaprāptasyaivottaraprāpterutpatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:852: etadapi vastuto vicārasahatayā sarvamanirvacanīyaṃ vijṛmbhitamavidyāyāḥ samutpannādvaitatattvasākṣātkāro na vidvānabhimanyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:859: yathā vidyābrahmaprāptyoḥ samānakālatā śrūyate- 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' 'ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvānna bibheti' 'tadātmānameva vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti tatsarvamabhavat' 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka
GSP33brsvbh4u:860: ekatvamanupaśyataḥ'iti paurvāparyāśravaṇāt paravidyāvato muktiṃ prati nopāyāntarāpekṣeti lakṣyate 'bhisaṃdhiḥ śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:862: na khalu brahmaivedaṃ viśvamahaṃ brahmāsmīti paribhāvanābhuvā jīvātmano brahmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇonmūlitāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāmasti gantavyagantṛvibhāgo viduṣastadabhāve kathamayamarcirādimārge pravarteta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:864: śraddhāvihīnasya dṛṣṭārthāni karmāṇi phalanti na phalanti ca /
GSP33brsvbh4u:865: adṛṣṭārthānāṃ tu phale kā kathetyuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33brsvbh4u:866: na cārcirādimārgabhāvanāyāḥ parabrahmaprāptyarthamaviduṣaḥ pratyupadeśastathā ca karmāntareṣviva nityādiṣu tatrāpi syāttasya pravṛttirapi sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:869: na tāvadanapekṣā 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:871: paravidyāpekṣatve tu mārgabhāvanāyāḥ kimiyaṃ vidyākārye mārgabhāvanā sāhāyakamācaratyatha vidyotpāde /
GSP33brsvbh4u:872: na tāvadvidyākārye tayā saha tasyā dvaitādvaitagocaratayā mitho virodhena sahāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:878: lokatvaṃ celāvṛttādivatsanniveśaviśeṣavati bhogabhūmau nirūḍhaṃ na kathañcidyogena prakāśe vyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:880: aprāmāṇikānāṃ bahupralāpāḥ sarvagatasya dravyasya guṇāḥ sarvagatā eva caitanyānandādayaśca guṇinaḥ paramātmano bhedābhedavanto guṇā ityādayo dūṣaṇāyānubhāṣyamāṇā apyaprāmāṇikatvamāvahantyasmākamityupekṣitāḥ granthayojanā tupratyagātmatvācca gantṝṇāṃ pratiprati añcati gacchatīti pratyak pratibhāvavṛtti brahma tadātmatvādgantṝṇāṃ jīvātmanāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:897: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-yathātathā nyagrodhāvayavī pariṇāmavānupajanāpāyadharmabhiḥ karmajaiḥ saṃyogavibhāgaiḥ saṃyujyatāmayaṃ punaḥ paramātmā nirastanikhilabhedaprapañcaḥ kūṭasthanityo
GSP33brsvbh4u:911: api ceyaṃ gatirna vicāraṃ sahata ityāha-gatikalpanāyāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:914: atha kasmādātyantikamananyatvaṃ na kalpyata ityata āha-atyantatādātmya iti
GSP33brsvbh4u:915: mṛdātmatayā hi svabhāvena ghaṭādayo bhāvāstadvikārā vyāptāḥ, tadabhāve na bhavanti śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatvābhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:916: vikārāvayavapakṣayośca tadvataḥ saha vikārāvayavaiḥsthiratvādacalatvādbrahmaṇaḥ saṃsāralakṣaṇaṃ gamanaṃ vikārāvayavayeranupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:918: anyānanyatve api caikasya virodhādasaṃbhavantī iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:920: tathāca brahmaṇyasaṃsaratyapi jīvasya saṃsāraḥ kalpyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:928: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāvayavatvapariṇāmātyantabhedapakṣeṣu tāttvikī saṃsāriteti muktau svabhāvahānājjīvānāṃ vināśaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:929: brahmavivartatve tu brahmaivaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratibimbānāmiva bimbaṃ taccāvināśīti na jīvavināśa ityāha-sarveṣveteṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:931: yathā hi kaphanimitto jvara upāttasya kaphasya viśeṣaṇādibhiḥ prakṣaye kaphāntarotpattinimittadadhyādivarjane praśānto 'pi na punarbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:932: evaṃ karmanimitto bandha upāttānāṃ karmaṇāmupabhogātprakṣaye praśāmyati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:933: karmāntarāmaṇāṃ ca bandhahetūnāmananuṣṭhānātkāraṇābhāve kāryānupapatterbandhābhāvātsvabhāvasiddho mokṣa ārogyamiva /
GSP33brsvbh4u:939: na cātropapattiḥ prabhavati saṃsārasyānāditayā karmāśayasyāpyasaṃkhyeyasyāniyatavipākakālasya bhogenocchettumaśakyatvādityāha-na caitattarkayitumapīti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:943: yadi hi nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi sukṛtamapi duṣkṛtamiva nirvaheyustataḥ kāmyakarmopadeśā dattajalāñjalayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brsvbh4u:944: nahyasti kaściccāturvarṇye cāturāśramye vā yo na nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi karoti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:948: samyagdarśī hi viraktaḥ kāmyaniṣiddhe varjayannapi pramādādupanipatite tenaivasamyagdarśanena kṣapayati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:949: jñānaparipāke ca na karotyeva ajñastu nipuṇo 'pi pramādātkaroti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:950: kṛte ca na kṣapayituṃ kṣamata iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:952: kartṛtvabhoktṛtve samākṣiptakriyābhoge te cedātmanaḥ svabhāvāvadhārite na tvāropite tato na śakyāvapanetum /
GSP33brsvbh4u:954: na ca bhogo 'pi satsvabhāvaḥ śakyo 'satkartuṃ, no khalu nīlamanīlaṃ śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi kartuṃ tadidamuktaṃ-svabhāvasyāparihāryatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:955: samāropitasya tvanirvacanīyasya tatsvabhāvasya śakyastattvajñānenāvaropaḥ kartuṃ sarpasyeva rajjutattvajñāneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:959: kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayornimittasaṃbandhasya ca śaktidvāreṇa nityatvādbhaviṣyati kadācideṣāṃ samudācāro yataḥ sukhaduḥkhe bhojyete iti saṃbhāvanātaḥ kutaḥ kaivalyaniścaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:972: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca |
GSP33brsvbh4u:975: santi hi mano brahmetyupāsītetyādyāḥ pratīkaviṣayā vidyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:979: naca brahmakratava eva brahmalokabhājo nātatkratava ityapyekāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:981: na caite na brahmakratavo mano brahmetyupāsītetyādau sarvatra brahmānugamena tatkratutvasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:982: phalaviśeṣasya brahmalokaprāptāvapyupapatteḥ, tasya sāvayavatayotkarṣanikarṣasaṃbhavāditi prāpte pratyucyate-
GSP33brsvbh4u:986: kimiva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt nāsti vacanasyātibhāra iha tu tadabhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:987: 'taṃ yathāyathopāsate tadeva bhavati'iti śruterautsargikyānnāsati viśeṣavacane 'pavādo yujyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:991: āśrayāntarapratyayasyāśrayāntare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:992: brahmāśrayaśca pratyayo nāmādiṣu prakṣipta iti nāmatantraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:997: na hyevamubhayathābhāva ubhayathārthatve kāṃścitpratīkālambanānna nayati vikāralambanānviduṣastu nayatītyabhyupagame kaściddoṣo 'sti 'aniyamaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:1001: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1005: prāgabhūtasya niṣpattau kartṛtvaṃ na sato yataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1009: svarūpāvasthānaṃ cedātmano muktirna sā niṣpadyeta, tasya gaganavadatyantasataḥ prāgasattvābhāvāt
GSP33brsvbh4u:1010: na cāsya bandhābhāvo niṣpadyate, tasya tucchasvabhāvasya kāryatvenātucchatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1011: phalatvaprasiddheśca mokṣasyākāryasya phalatvānavakalpanādāgantunā rūpeṇa kenacidutpattau sveneti prāptamanūdyata iti prāpte
GSP33brsvbh4u:1014: anadhigatāvabodhanaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ śābdamagatyā kathañcidanuvādatayā varṇyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1016: na cāsya niṣpattyasaṃbhavaḥ, sata iva ghaṭādeḥ sāṃvyavahārikeṇa pramāṇena bandhavigamasyāpi niṣpatterlokasiddhatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1027: nanu jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti paurvāparyaśravaṇāt svarūpaniṣpatteranyā jyotirupasaṃpattiḥ tathāca bhautikatve 'pi na mokṣavyāghātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1028: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi jyotirupasaṃpadya tat parityajediti śrūyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1029: tadadhyāhāre 'pi tatpratipādanavaiyarthyaṃ tadaparityāge ca jyotiṣaiva svena rūpeṇeti gamyate
GSP33brsvbh4u:1030: tasya ca bhūtatve vikāratvānmaraṇadharmakatvaprasiddheramuktitvamiti prāpte pratyucyate-jyotiṣpadasya mukhyatvaṃ bhautike yadyapi sthitam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1032: paraṃ jyotiriti hi parapadasamabhivyāhārātparatvasya cānapekṣasya brahmaṇyeva pravṛttejyotiṣi cāpare kiñcidapekṣya paratvātparaṃ jyotiriti vākyādātmaivātra gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1034: yat saṃpadya niṣpadyata iti tanmukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītivat /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1038: yadyapi jīvātmā brahmaṇo na bhinna iti tatra tatropapāditaṃ tathāpi sa tatra paryetītyādhārādheyabhāvavyapadeśasya saṃpattṛsaṃpattavyabhāvavyapadeśasya ca samādhānārthamāha //4//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1041: upanyāsa uddeśo jñātasya yathā ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1043: yathā sa tatra paryeti jakṣadramamāṇa iti, tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatītyetadajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1051: muktaḥ saṃpadyate svairityāha sma kila jaiminiḥ //
GSP33brsvbh4u:1052: na ca citsvabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvātmāno 'pahatapāpmatvādayo bhāvātmanaśca sarvajñatvādayo dharmā advaitaṃ ghnanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1053: no khalu dharmiṇo dharmā bhidyante, mā bhūdgavāśvavaddharmidharmabhāvābhāva iti jaiminirācārya uvāca //5//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1060: atha na bhidyante tata ekasmādātmano 'bhedānmitho 'pi na bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1064: naca dharmiṇa ātmano na bhidyante mithastu bhidyanta iti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1067: bhedābhedau ca parasparavirodhādekatrābhāvānna saṃbhavata ityupapāditaṃ prathame sūtre /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1069: tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā teṣāmapi kālpanikatvamiti na tāttvikī taddharmatā śliṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1073: tadidamuktaṃ-śabdavikalpajā evaite apahatapāpmatvādayo na tu sāṃvyavahārikā apīti //6//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1075: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ |
GSP33brsvbh4u:1081: apahatapāpmasatyakāmatvādayastvaupādhikatayātāttvikā api vyāvahārikapramāṇopanītatayā lokasiddhā nātyantāsanto yena tacchabdā rāhoḥ śira itivadavāstavā ityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1086: loke hi kañcidarthaṃ cikīrṣuḥ prayatate prayatamānaḥ samīhate samīhānastamarthamāpnotīti kramo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1088: tena śrutyāpi lokavṛttamanurudhyamānayā viduṣastādṛśa eva kramo
GSP33brsvbh4u:1090: avadhāraṇaṃ tu saṃkalpādeveti laukikaṃ yatnagauravamapekṣya vidyāprabhāvato viduṣo yatnalāghavāt
GSP33brsvbh4u:1093: yathā manorathamātropasthāpitā strī straiṇānāṃ caramadhātuvisargaheturevaṃ pitrādayo 'pyasya saṃkalpopasthāpitāḥ kalpiṣyante svakāryāyetyata āha-naca
GSP33brsvbh4u:1095: santi hi khalu kānicidvastusvarūpasādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strīvastusādhyāni dantakṣatamaṇimālādīni
GSP33brsvbh4u:1097: tatra manorathamātropanīte pitrādau bhavantu tajjñānamātrasādhyāni kāryāṇi natu tatsādhyāni bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1098: nahi straiṇasya romaharṣādivadbhavanti strīvastusādhyā maṇimālādayastadidamuktaṃpuṣkalaṃ bhogamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate- pitrādīnāṃ samutthānaṃ saṃkalpādeva tacchruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1100: pramāṇāntarānapekṣā hi śrutiḥ svārthaṃ gocarayantī na pramāṇāntareṇa śakyā bādhitum /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1101: anumānameva tu svotpādāya pakṣadharmatvādivanmānāntarābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ svasāmagrīmadhyapātenāpekṣamāṇaṃ sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tadviruddhayā śrutyā bādhyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1104: tathāhurāgaminaḥ-ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte 'gastya iva samudraṃ pibati sa iva daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1112: anekadhābhāvaścarddhiprabhāvabhuvo manobhedādvā stutimātraṃ vā kathañcidbhūmavidyāyāṃ nirguṇāyāṃ tadasaṃbhavādasatāpi hi guṇena stutirbhavatyeveti //10//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1118: ata eva saubharerabhivinirmitavividhadehasyāparyāyeṇa māndhātṛkanyābhiḥ pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1121: yadyapi nirguṇāyamidaṃ bhaumavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate tathāpi tasyāḥ purastādanena saguṇāvasthāgatenaiśvaryeṇa nirguṇaiva vidyā stūyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1124: tasmānmanaḥ śarīrendriyayoga aiśvaryaśālināṃ niyameneti mene jaiminiḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:1127: manaseti kevalamanoviṣayāṃ ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatīti śarīrendriyabhedaviṣayāṃ ca śrutimupalabhyāniyamavādī khalu bādarāyaṇo niyamavādau pūrvayorna sahate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1130: kāmeṣu hi ramaṇaṃ samanaskendriyeṇa śarīreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ siddhameveti nāsti śaṅkā manoyogasyeti tadvyavacchedo vyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1136: dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmā upeyurityupāyicodanena ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satramupayantīti ca dvādaśāhasya satratvaṃ bahukartṛkasya gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1137: evaṃ tasyaiva dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanena niyatakartṛparimāṇatvena dvirātreṇa yajatetyādivadahīnatvamapi gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1138: saṃprati śarīrendriyābhāvena manomātreṇa viduṣaḥ svapnavatsūkṣmo bhogo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1141: yadi punaḥ suṣuptavadabhogo bhavet naiṣā śrutirupapadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1154: vijñānātmānādyavidyākalpitaprādeśikāntaḥkaraṇāvacchedenānādijīvabhāvamāpannaḥ prādeśikaḥ sanna dehāntarāṇi svabhāvanirmitānyapi nānāpradeśavartīni sāntaḥkaraṇo yugapadāveṣṭumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1160: evaṃ nirmāṇaśarīrāṇyapi sendriyāṇīti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-śarīratvaṃ na jātu syādbhogādhiṣṭhānatāṃ vinā /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1161: sa tridheti śarīratvamuktaṃ yuktaṃ ca tadvibhau //
GSP33brsvbh4u:1162: sa tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhetyādikā śrutirviduṣo nānābhāvamācakṣāṇā bhinnaśarīrendriyopādhisaṃbandhe
GSP33brsvbh4u:1164: nahi yantrāṇi bhinnāni nirmāya vāhayanyantravāho nānātvenāpadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1165: bhogādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ ca śarīratvaṃ nābhogādhiṣṭhāneṣu yantreṣviva yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1168: naca sarvagatasya vastuto vigalitaprāyāvidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasyevautpattikāntaḥkaraṇavaśyatā yena tadautpattikamantaḥkaraṇamāgantukāntaḥkaraṇāntarasaṃbandhamasya vārayet /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1169: tasmādvidvān sarvasya vaśī sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ sendriyamanāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni caikapade praviśya tattadindriyamantaḥkaraṇaisteṣu lokeṣu mukto viharatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1170: pradīpavaditi tu nidarśanaṃ pradīpaikyaṃ pradīpavyaktiṣūpacaryate bhinnavartivartinīnāṃ bhinnavyaktīnāṃ bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1176: salilamiva salilaḥ salilaprātipadikātsarvaprātipadikebhya ityupamānādācāre kvipi kṛte pacādyaci ca kṛte rūpam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1182: āsu kāścicchrutayaḥ suṣuptimapekṣya kāścittu saṃpattiṃ tadadhikārāt /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1183: aiśvaryaśrutayastu saguṇavidyāvipākāvasthāpekṣā muktyabhisaṃdhānaṃ tu tadavasthāsatteryathāruṇadarśane saṃdhyāyāṃ divasābhidhānam //16//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1188: 'āpnoti svārājyaṃ' 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' 'sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati'ityādiśrutibhyo viduṣaḥ parabrahmaṇa ivānyānadhīnatvamaiśvaryamavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1189: nanvasya brahmopāsanālabdhamaiśvaryaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhīnaṃ na tu svabhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh4u:1194: na ca viduṣāṃ parameśvarādhīnaiśvaryasiddhitvāttadgatamaiśvaryaṃ yena laukikā iva rājāno mahārājādhīnaḥ svavyāpāre vidvāṃsaḥ parameśvarādhīnā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1195: na khalu yadadhīnotpādaṃ yasya rūpaṃ tattadrūpādūnaṃ bhavatīti kaścinniyamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1196: tatsamānāṃ tadadhikānāṃ ca darśanāttathā hyantevāsī gurvadhīnavidhaḥ tatsamastadadhiko vā dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1198: tadiha niratiśayaiśvaryatvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhūvanvidvāṃsastato
GSP33brsvbh4u:1202: tadete svatantrāḥ santastadvyāpāre jagatsarjane 'pi pravarteranniti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-nityatvādanapekṣatvāt śrutestatprakramādapi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1204: jagatsargalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇaikasvabhāvasyaiva hi bhavatu āho kāryakāraṇasvabhāvasya
GSP33brsvbh4u:1205: tatrobhayasvabhāvasya svotpattau mūlakāraṇāpekṣasya pūrvasiddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇamabhyupetavya iti sa evaiko 'stu jagatkāraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1211: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1214: tatrāgantukānāṃ kāraṇādhīnajanmaiśvaryāṇāṃ gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayāsamatvānnityaiśvaryaśālinaḥ sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate START BsVBh_4,4.7.18
GSP33brsvbh4u:1218: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam
GSP33brsvbh4u:1221: vikāravarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha |
GSP33brsvbh4u:1224: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti
GSP33brsvbh4u:1228: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1229: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti
GSP33brsvbh4u:1231: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ, atatkratutvādupāsakasya /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1232: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1234: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi //20//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1237: na kevalaṃ svārājyasyeśvarādhīnatayājagatsarjanam, sākṣādbhogamātreṇa tena parameśvareṇa sāmyābhidhānādapi vyapadeśaliṅgāditi /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1240: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1241: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
GSP33brsvbh4u:1243: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti
GSP33brsvbh4u:1256: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha-nityasiddheti //22//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1258: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh4u:1269: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ /
